fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: A "minister" is defined as a person with a specific set of duties (a portfolio). It excludes ministers without portfolio and no specific responsibilities. Please provide an estimate if you do not know the exact figure.
fxInfo_question: In the first cabinet after this national election, what percentage (%) of the ministers was female?
